author: plexiglass
title: One of my first Lego Products
review:
I remember that this may have been the first Lego product I ever received as a child.

It was very simple, but it had quite a variety of pieces that you don't see anymore, like a door within a door frame or a thick arch.

The bucket itself was nice, and it had photos of builds that looked so cheerful and happy. I especially liked the yellow-faced "girl" that came with the set. Always brought a smile to my face.

This is not something you need to go out of your way to find, but it shows a time when lego sets emphasised simplicity and imagination over themes and unique pieces.
